Package com.example.lotto649.Models

Class HomePageModel

java.lang.Object
com.example.lotto649.AbstractClasses.AbstractModel
com.example.lotto649.Models.HomePageModel
public class HomePageModel extends AbstractModel
Model class for managing a collection of events. Interacts with Firebase Firestore to fetch and manage event data.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    static interface 
    HomePageModel.EventFetchCallback
    Callback interface for fetching event documents.
    static interface 
    HomePageModel.MyEventsCallback
    Callback interface for retrieving the current user's events.

    • getMyEvents
